$$log(\frac{p}{1-p}) = \beta_{0}$$
$log(\frac{p}{1-p}) = \beta_{0} + \beta_{1}\textrm{education} + \beta_{2}\textrm{orphan}_{1} + \\\beta_{3}\textrm{orphan}_{2} + \beta_{4}\textrm{age} + \beta_{5}\textrm{family wealth}_{1} + \\\beta_{6}\textrm{family wealth}_{2}$


$$log(\frac{p}{1-p}) = \beta_{0} + \beta_{1}\textrm{education} + \beta_{2}\textrm{orphan}_{1} + \beta_{3}\textrm{orphan}_{2} + \beta_{4}\textrm{age}$$

$$log(\frac{p}{1-p}) = \beta_{0} + \beta_{1}\textrm{education} + \beta_{2}\textrm{age} + \beta_{3}\textrm{age*education}$$

$log(\frac{p}{1-p}) = \beta_{0} + \beta_{1}\textrm{education} + \beta_{2}\textrm{age} + \beta_{3}\textrm{orphan}_{1} + \beta_{4}\textrm{orphan}_{2} + \beta_{5}\textrm{education*orphan}_{1} + \\\beta_{6}\textrm{education*orphan}_{2}$


$log(\frac{p}{1-p}) = \beta_{0} + \beta_{1}\textrm{education} + \beta_{2}\textrm{age} + \beta_{3}\textrm{family wealth}_{1} + \beta_{4}\textrm{family wealth}_{2} + \\\beta_{5}\textrm{family wealth}_{1}*\textrm{education} + \beta_{6}\textrm{family wealth}_{2}*\textrm{education} $
